Main API Documentation¶

Welcome to the documentation for the contact_api project. This documentation provides an overview of the API endpoints, schemas, and utility functions used in the project.

main.create_contact(contact: ContactCreate, token: str = fastapi.Depends, db: sqlalchemy.orm.Session = fastapi.Depends)¶

Create a new contact.

Parameters:

  • contact (schemas.ContactCreate) – Contact creation data.

  • token (str) – User’s access token.

  • db (Session) – Database session.

Returns:

The created contact.

Return type:

schemas.Contact

main.create_user(user: UserCreate, background_tasks: fastapi.BackgroundTasks, db: sqlalchemy.orm.Session = fastapi.Depends)¶

Create a new user.

Parameters:

  • user (schemas.UserCreate) – User creation data.

  • background_tasks (BackgroundTasks) – Background tasks manager.

  • db (Session) – Database session.

Returns:

The created user.

Return type:

schemas.User

main.delete_contact(contact_id: int, token: str = fastapi.Depends, db: sqlalchemy.orm.Session = fastapi.Depends)¶

Delete a contact by ID.

Parameters:

  • contact_id (int) – ID of the contact.

  • token (str) – User’s access token.

  • db (Session) – Database session.

Returns:

Success message.

Return type:

dict

main.get_db()[source]¶
main.login_for_access_token(form_data: fastapi.security.OAuth2PasswordRequestForm = fastapi.Depends, db: sqlalchemy.orm.Session = fastapi.Depends)¶

Authenticate user and return access token.

Parameters:

  • form_data (OAuth2PasswordRequestForm) – Form data for user authentication.

  • db (Session) – Database session.

Returns:

Access token and token type.

Return type:

dict

main.read_contact(contact_id: int, token: str = fastapi.Depends, db: sqlalchemy.orm.Session = fastapi.Depends)¶

Retrieve a contact by ID.

Parameters:

  • contact_id (int) – ID of the contact.

  • token (str) – User’s access token.

  • db (Session) – Database session.

Returns:

The retrieved contact.

Return type:

schemas.Contact

main.read_contacts(skip: int = 0, limit: int = 10, search: str | None = None, token: str = fastapi.Depends, db: sqlalchemy.orm.Session = fastapi.Depends)¶

Retrieve a list of contacts.

Parameters:

  • skip (int) – Number of contacts to skip.

  • limit (int) – Maximum number of contacts to return.

  • search (Optional[str]) – Search query for contacts.

  • token (str) – User’s access token.

  • db (Session) – Database session.

Returns:

List of contacts.

Return type:

List[schemas.Contact]

Root endpoint.

Returns:

Welcome message.

Return type:

dict

main.update_avatar(file: fastapi.UploadFile, token: str = fastapi.Depends, db: sqlalchemy.orm.Session = fastapi.Depends)¶

Update the user’s avatar.

Parameters:

  • file (UploadFile) – Uploaded avatar file.

  • token (str) – User’s access token.

  • db (Session) – Database session.

Returns:

URL of the uploaded avatar.

Return type:

dict

main.update_contact(contact_id: int, contact: ContactUpdate, token: str = fastapi.Depends, db: sqlalchemy.orm.Session = fastapi.Depends)¶

Update a contact by ID.

Parameters:

  • contact_id (int) – ID of the contact.

  • contact (schemas.ContactUpdate) – Updated contact data.

  • token (str) – User’s access token.

  • db (Session) – Database session.

Returns:

The updated contact.

Return type:

schemas.Contact

main.verify_email(token: str, db: sqlalchemy.orm.Session = fastapi.Depends)¶

Parameters:

  • token (str) – Email verification token.

  • db (Session) – Database session.
